amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funding to approve for human consumption any cattle, sheep, swine, goats, horses, mules, or other equines that are unable to stand or walk unassisted at a slaughtering, packing, meat-canning, rendering, or similar establishment subject to inspection at the point of examination and inspection.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds in the bill to approve for human consumption, meats from downed animals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ackerman amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 202 (Roll no. 357).
